text:
Dishcraft Robotics|Onsite in San Carlos CA|FTE|Full Stack Developer|Software Engineer for Hardware Integration.

Dishcraft offers Robotic Solutions for Commerical Kitchens.

At Dishcraft First and foremost, we value people, intellectual engagement, and transparent communication.

We are looking for a highly motivated, intellectually curious and passionate software engineers to bring our robots to life.

We are looking for Full Stack Engineers with React or Angular experience with heavy Database/real-time data and IoT experience.

For the HW Integration role, we are focused on developers with C++ and python experience working with Robotics systems.

Check out all of our openings in Robotics, Manufacturing, AI, and Mechanical at

http://www.dishcraft.com/jobs/
